title: Structural Basis of RNA Cap Modification by SARS-CoV-2 Coronavirus
author: Yogesh Gupta
affiliations: Department of Biochemistry and Structural Biology
Division of Hematology and Oncology, Department of Medicine
University of Texas Health San Antonio
abstract: The novel severe acute respiratory syndrome coronoavirus-2 (SARS-CoV-2), the causative agent of COVID-19 illness, has caused over 2 million infections worldwide in four months. In SARS coronaviruses, the non-structural protein 16 (nsp16) methylates the 5’-end of virally encoded

S.Q. is supported by the GCCRI
